skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Crafting responsive, accessible, and visually engaging interfaces using React, JavaScript, HTML5, and Tailwind CSS. I focus on delivering seamless user experiences through clean design and performance optimization.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Building scalable and secure APIs with Node.js and Express, integrating with databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL. My back-end work emphasizes efficiency, maintainability, and robust architecture.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Designing intuitive and user-centered interfaces with attention to usability and aesthetics. I combine logic and creativity to turn complex workflows into simple, delightful experiences.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Developing visually impressive and high-performance websites using Webflow. Perfect for rapid prototyping, marketing sites, and SEO-friendly layouts with pixel-perfect design control.

portfolio.title: Gear Shop
portfolio.description: A website for a gear shop that showcases products, features a shopping cart, and integrates payment processing. Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive design.

portfolio.title: Social app for developers
portfolio.description: A social app designed for developers to connect, share projects, and collaborate. Features user profiles, project showcases, and a community forum. Built with React and Node.js.

portfolio.title: Smart Home App
portfolio.description: A smart home application that allows users to control IoT devices, monitor energy usage, and automate tasks. Built with React Native for cross-platform mobile support.
